00030                          const shared_ptr<XRuby> &rbsupport);

00044     void onKillTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node);

00047     FrmRubyThread *const m_pForm;
00048     const shared_ptr<XRubyThread> m_rubyThread;
00049     const shared_ptr<XRuby> m_rubySupport;
